simulator
Class VirtualUser

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              simulator.VirtualUser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote, User
public class VirtualUser
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements User

The VirtualUser instance is the server callback receiver in this Maze RMI setup. The constructor takes a BoxMazeInterface to establish a connection to the server and a Maze applet instance, to establish a connection to the Graphical User Interface.

The init() method establishes the connection to the server by joining the maze there and also puts the VirtualUser at a random starting position.

a. getFirstIterationLoop() returns an array of positions that leads the way out of the the maze, around and to the beginning of the maze, from the starting position.
b. getIterationLoop() returns an array of positions that leads the way out of the maze from the entry and around the maze to the beginning.

The movement through the maze is performed by calling move(), this happens at the client.

Author:
asd, runar
See Also:
